summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to an exchange of properties between the City of Seattle and Seattle University; authorizing a contract for the exchange of properties; authorizing conveyance of City real property to Seattle University; providing for reimbursement of the Emergency Fund for prior appropriation; crediting proceeds of the exchange to the Transit Fund; authorizing the Department of Community Development to enter into leases for acquired properties; and appropriating funds from the Transit Fund for property management expenses.
